ideas.title: This week on How I AI: How Webflow’s CPO built an AI chief of staff

How One Tech Leader Reimagined Team Collaboration
Building an AI Sidekick That Actually Works

tips: Use inline audio/podcast embed for immediate context
Include personal reflection on AI productivity insights
Create interactive poll about AI workflow adoption
Optimize headline for SEO with precise keywords
Include detailed step-by-step implementation breakdown
Add expert quotes to boost credibility
Frame article as professional development strategy
Include quantifiable productivity metrics
Tag key industry leaders for broader reach

visualDirection.description: Bold, tech-forward design with dynamic gradient overlays. Futuristic sans-serif typography. Isometric illustrations of AI workflow. Muted tech-blue color palette with electric accent colors. Subtle motion graphics showing AI collaboration dynamics.

exampleOutline: Section 3: AI Chief of Staff Architecture

ideas.title: Big Tech basically took Trump’s unpredictable trade war lying down
ideas.description: Big Tech basically took Trump’s unpredictable trade war lying down
hooks: How Big Tech Surrendered to Trump's Trade War Chaos
5 Shocking Ways Tech Giants Folded Under Pressure
The Silent Surrender: Tech's Trade War Capitulation

tips: Use a personal narrative opener about trade war impact
Include real-time screenshots or tweet embeds
Invite reader comments and trade war experiences
Add SEO-friendly subheadings for each list point
Include expert quotes to boost credibility
Use data visualizations to illustrate trade war effects
Frame content as professional industry analysis
Include corporate strategy implications
Use network tagging for broader reach

visualDirection.description: Bold, high-contrast infographic style with geopolitical map overlays, using electric blue and deep red color palette. Dynamic typography with angular design elements suggesting conflict and disruption. Animated data points and timeline transitions.

exampleOutline: Introduction: The Unexpected Tech Trade War Landscape
Context: Trump's Unpredictable Global Economic Maneuvers
